entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
